valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 24 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 25 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low 250 miles southwest of Iceland 994 expected just northwest of Iceland with little change by midday tomorrow. High southern Norway 1034, slow-moving with little change by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, southerly 4 or 5. In east, southerly or southeasterly 2 to 4, occasionally 5 later.
Sea state
In west, moderate, occasionally slight in far south. in east, slight or moderate.
Weather
In west, fair. In east, fair.
Visibility
In west, good. In east, good.
